mapper.select: SELECT a.code FROM kc_reported a WHERE a.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.`code`, a.address, a.capacity, a.userId, a.createBy, a.createTime, a.updateBy, a.updateTime, a.isDel, b.userName AS createName, c.userName AS updateName FROM base_storehouse a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.createBy = b.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.updateBy = c.userId WHERE a.isDel = 0
SELECT a.id, a.reportedName FROM kc_reportedtype a

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.storehouseId, f.name AS storehouseName, a.reportedTypeId, h.reportedName AS reportedTypeName, a.approverBy, a.approvalStatus, a.approverRemark, a.documenterBy, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.modificationTime, a.modificationBy, b.userName AS approverName, c.userName AS documenterName, d.userName AS createName, e.userName AS modificationName FROM kc_reported a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.approverBy = b.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.documenterBy = c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.createBy = d.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user e ON a.modificationBy = e.userId LEFT JOIN base_storehouse f ON a.storehouseId = f.id LEFT JOIN kc_reportedtype h ON a.reportedTypeId = h.id WHERE a.isDel = 0 AND a.`code`=#{code}
SELECT a.id, a.reportedCode, a.medicineId, a.quantity, b.`name` AS medicineName FROM kc_reporteddetail a LEFT JOIN base_medicine b ON a.medicineId = b.id WHERE a.reportedCode=#{code}
mapper.update: UPDATE kc_reported SET approverBy=#{approverBy}, reportedTypeId=#{reportedTypeId}, approvalStatus=#{approvalStatus}, approverRemark=#{approverRemark}, modificationTime=now(), modificationBy=#{modificationBy} WHERE `code`=#{code}
UPDATE kc_reporteddetail SET isDel=1 WHERE reportedCode=#{reportedCode}
